comment.author: 35636458@N06
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Commission Rifle, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 35636458@N06
comment._content:
Bedankt heel veel!

Thank You very much! 

German soldiers during an exercise.  Infantry training.

Even though there is no date, we can see the aushilfspatronetasche or ersatz ammo pouch on the soldier who is digging. It tells us post 1914.

Due to the severe shortage of Gewehr 98 rifles, these rekruten are armed with the obsolete Infantrie Gewehr 71, which was first issued in 1872. Gew 71 was phased out of aktiv service starting in 1885, with the introduction of Infantrie Gewehr 71/84.

comment._content: "Hey Dieter, sollen wir angreiffen?" "Bah, kein Bock Man... reich ma ne Kippe rüba ich bau ma einen" "Weet oder Hash?" "Beides" "Hamma"
